toString().Description: Constructs a string describing this object. This method returns the string @B_java#nio#ByteOrder#BIG_ENDIAN_E@ and @B_java#nio#ByteOrder#LITTLE_ENDIAN_E@.

Returns: The native byte order of the hardware upon which this Java virtual machine is running
nativeOrder().Description: Retrieves the native byte order of the underlying platform. This method is defined so that performance-sensitive Java code can allocate direct buffers with the same byte order as the hardware. Native code libraries are often more efficient when such buffers are used.

ClassDesc: A typesafe enumeration for byte orders.
